mapper.select: SELECT A.`id`, A.`productName`, C.`reviewPoint` , D.`point`, D.`sort`, D. `status`, D.`updatedAt` FROM `sell_post` AS A RIGHT JOIN `application` AS B ON A.id = B.sellPostId LEFT JOIN `review` AS C ON B.sellPostId = C.sellPostId LEFT JOIN `point` AS D ON C.sellPostId = D.sellPostId WHERE B.memberId = #{memberId} AND B.`status` = 1;
